description.name: user can list all added articles in BibTex format

scenario.name: user can list all added articles in BibTexFormat

when.name: page is loaded and there are no articles in database

then.name: only title of the page should be printed

scenario.name: user can list all added articles in BibTexFormat

when.name: page is loaded and there are articles in database

then.name: title and articles in BibTex Format should be printed

when.name: information for the article to be added is entered

description.name: user can list all added articles in a readable form

scenario.name: user can list all added articles in a readable form

then.name: information should be printed on the screen in readable form
